languageKey.label: Navigate to the YouTube video that you want to embed. The YouTube video will appear in your browser's address bar and includes everything to the right of = (watch?v=Nh5tewhGg_E ... the id would be Nh5tewhGg_E).
The height of the video should be in proportion to the width - typically at 4:3 or 16:9. Both Height and Width are required.
The width of the video should be in proportion to the height - typically at 4:3 or 16:9. Both Height and Width are required.
